Game.Name: Pok√©mon Chaos Black
Game.Plot: Pokemon Chaos Black is definitely one of the most excellent Pokemon Hacks. It is a hack version of Pokemon Fire Red and is a completed fully version in English. So the author created Pokemon Chaos Black GBA Game Card and sold it on Ebay.com. Thousands of people bought it and supported this game. It has a special box art which is designed to sell Game Card. The graphics are the same as Pokemon Fire Red but the gameplay is brand new. You will like Pokemon Chaos Black. You start the game and Professor Oak call you to his Lab. He will give you three starters and you have to choose one. Then you have a battle with your Rival. It is so easy to win because it looks like a guide for you. Then you go to Route 1 and begin your adventure. You will come to Viridian City and after get the PokeDex. Many surprises are waiting for you ahead.
